name: Squid
intro: Cross-chain swap and liquidity routing protocol on Axelar Network
introduce: Squid is the cross-chain swap and liquidity routing protocol on Axelar Network. Squid utilises existing DEXs to swap and send any native token between chains. Squid’s API and SDK supports swaps between any token type, and enables multiple swaps and on-chain function calls to be linked together across a large list of integrated chains, so developers and users can explore new ecosystems in an instant.
